DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective current proposal strengthen putative link FFA induce insulin resistance atherosclerotic vascular disease ( ASVD ) . To end , investigator test follow hypothesis : 1 ) FFA induced activation protein kinase C βII ( PKC β II ) δ serine kinase IκB kinase ( IKK ) human muscle associate decrease insulin stimulate tyrosine phosphorylation insulin receptor substrate-1 ( IRS-1 ) IRS-1 associate phosphatidylinositol 3 ( PI3 ) kinase ; 2 ) change precede development insulin resistance ; 3 ) decrease IκB-α result activation nuclear factor κB ( NFκB ) expression adhesion molecule cytokine ; 4 ) PKC IKK involve produce insulin resistance activation IκB/ NFκB pathway lastly 5 ) mechanism operative healthy volunteer also operative patient T2DM.The investigator test hypothesis normal ( current ) diabetic volunteer ( previously complete ) . DOC.detailed_description: All subject admit GCRC afternoon test ( Day 1 ) undergo thorough physical examination . Routine admission lab test ( include 2-h 75g OGTT ) body composition measurement obtain . A standardized dinner serve ~ 6PM . The next ( Day 2 ) overnight fast , IV line place ( arm wrap heat blanket keep 70ºF arterialize venous blood ) . The following study perform . Thirty-two healthy volunteer undergo euglycemic - hyperinsulinemic clamping without radioactive isotope ( n=16 ) without ( n=16 ) lipid/heparin co-infusion 8 hour . Serial ( 0 , 1 , 2 4 h ) muscle fat biopsy serial blood sample ( q ' 1 h ) obtain . The following measurement obtain muscle biopsy T-cell extract : PKC-βI II PKC-δ , IKK , IκB-α , NFκB , IRS-1 tyrosine phosphorylation , IRS-1 associate PI3- kinase , ICAM , VCAM e-selectin mRNAs .
DOC.criteria: The investigator plan study 32 healthy normal subject . These volunteer male female , age 30 75 year race . None volunteer family history diabetes endocrine disorder none take medication . Patients chronic health problem include cardiovascular , pulmonary , hematologic ( *Hb < 9 g/dl ) , renal ( serum creatinine > 1.8 mg/dl ) , hepatic disease , AIDS chronic infectious disease exclude . Pregnant woman exclude . Nonpregnant woman study follicular phase menstrual cycle . If need , pregnancy test perform exclude pregnancy .
